tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE models_measurements (
    model_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    height DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
    bust_size VARCHAR(10),
    waist_size VARCHAR(10),
    hip_size VARCHAR(10),
    shoe_size DECIMAL(3,1)
);

CREATE TABLE measurements (
    model_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    height DECIMAL,
    weight DECIMAL,
    bust_size VARCHAR,
    waist_size VARCHAR,
    hip_size VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE runway_walks (
    walk_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id UUID REFERENCES measurements(model_id),
    walk_style VARCHAR,
    confidence_level INTEGER,
    runway_performance VARCHAR,
    feedback TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE models (
    model_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name TEXT,
    nationality TEXT,
    age INT,
    height FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE models_measurements (
    model_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name STRING,
    height FLOAT,
    bust_size FLOAT,
    waist_size FLOAT,
    hip_size FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE runway_walks (
    walk_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT,
    walk_date DATE,
    walk_duration INT,
    walk_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE fashion_shows (
    show_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    show_name STRING,
    show_date DATE,
    location STRING,
    theme STRING
);

CREATE TABLE models (
    model_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    height DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    bust_size DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    waist_size DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    hip_size DECIMAL NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE runway_walks (
    walk_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id UUID NOT NULL,
    walk_description TEXT NOT NULL,
    walk_duration TIME NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (model_id) REFERENCES models(model_id)
);

CREATE TABLE bookings (
    booking_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id UUID NOT NULL,
    show_id UUID NOT NULL,
    booking_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (model_id) REFERENCES models(model_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (show_id) REFERENCES fashion_shows(show_id)
);
